plugins.name: Sliding Text
plugins.description:
Sliding Text transforms static text into engaging animated components with just a few clicks. This plugin allows designers to:


  1. Convert any text layer into a dynamic text slide component
  2. Customize animation direction (top-to-bottom, bottom-to-top, left-to-right, right-to-left)
  3. Fine-tune animation timing, stagger delay, and easing
  4. Preview animations directly in the plugin interface
  5. Create components that maintain the original text's font, size, and styling
  6. Generate a "done" state for the final animation frame


Simply select a text layer, enter your phrases or words separated by commas, choose your animation settings, and let the plugin generate a fully configured component with smart animate transitions. Perfect for creating engaging sliding text / rotating messages / dynamic text effects without any coding knowledge.
plugins.tagline: Smooth text slide animations with customizable directions and timing

129512.name: Sliding Text
129512.description:

  3. Fine-tune animation timing, stagger delay, and easing
  4. Preview animations directly in the plugin interface
  5. Create components that maintain the original text's font, size, and styling
  6. Generate a "done" state for the final animation frame


Simply select a text layer, enter your phrases or words separated by commas, choose your animation settings, and let the plugin generate a fully configured component with smart animate transitions. Perfect for creating engaging sliding text / rotating messages / dynamic text effects without any coding knowledge.
129512.tagline: Smooth text slide animations with customizable directions and timing

plugins.name: Set Gradient Style
plugins.description:
The plugin allows you to transfer the parameters of a new gradient to previously published styles, simplifying the process of manually transferring angles and breakpoints. This may be necessary if you need to update the current style, but doing it manually will cause.


  1. Select a Frame, Rectangle or Vector with a new gradient
  2. Write local style name which you want to update
  3. Press "Set style"
plugins.tagline: Transferring a gradient parameters to a previously published style

124350.name: Set Gradient Style
124350.description:

  1. Select a Frame, Rectangle or Vector with a new gradient
  2. Write local style name which you want to update
  3. Press "Set style"
124350.tagline: Transferring a gradient parameters to a previously published style

plugins.name: Color Extractor
plugins.description: A Figma plugin that quickly detects the dominant color of the selected image layer and automatically adds it as a new fill to the layer. Perfect for designers who need to extract and use the main color in their layouts, palettes, or backgrounds.
plugins.tagline: Detect and add the dominant color of an image to your layer fills with one click.

120795.name: Color Extractor
120795.description: A Figma plugin that quickly detects the dominant color of the selected image layer and automatically adds it as a new fill to the layer. Perfect for designers who need to extract and use the main color in their layouts, palettes, or backgrounds.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin requires access to Figma's CDN to retrieve and process images used in the selected layers.

120795.tagline: Detect and add the dominant color of an image to your layer fills with one click.

plugins.name: Update FigJam Colors
plugins.description:
A small utility plugin to automatically update your FigJam stickies, shapes, sections and connectors to the new colors released on Feb 4 2025.


Instructions

  1. open the page where you want to update colors
  2. run plugin via the Action Menu ( ⌘+P, CTRL + P)
  3. see new colors!


Feedback & Support

  1. @actuallyakbar on Twitter
  2. github.com/akbarbmirza
plugins.tagline: Automatically update your FigJam stickies, shapes, sections and connectors to the new FigJam colors

plugins.name: Psi Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
Eliminate the hassle of searching for brand assets with the "Psi Figma Plugin". Instantly access Property Shop Investment LLC’s logos, colors, fonts, and more to streamline your design workflow.


Stay consistent and on-brand effortlessly with the "Psi Figma Plugin", crafted to centralize all your assets in one convenient place.


Key Features of the “ Psi Figma Plugin” :


  1. Import Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets directly into Figma.


  1. Access the latest logos, icons, colors, fonts, and design essentials with ease.


  1. Sync your Property Shop Investment LLC brand assets for fast and centralized access.



About Psi Figma Plugin :


The "Psi Figma Plugin" is the ultimate tool for managing Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets. It ensures Our brand stays consistent and accessible, empowering Our designs with the most up-to-date materials directly within Figma.


Have Questions or Feedback? Contact us at a.jarwan@psinv.net

accepted.name: Alaa Jarwan
accepted.description: UI/UX Designer passionate about crafting intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. Blends creativity with functionality to enhance user interaction

plugins.tagline: "Psi Figma Plugin: Our Brand, Seamlessly Streamlined."

plugins.name: Structura Swagger Annotator
plugins.description:
Description

Structura revolutionizes how you manage API, design, and copy documentation. With an all-in-one platform, gain clarity on workflows, discover the exact APIs and components used, and ensure precise copies across your designs.


How To?

  1. Run this plugin into your figma files
  2. Paste the whole swagger documentation
  3. Select one of the component and map it by filling the correct path and method
  4. To update the swagger just reupload again the whole json swagger


Feature Request?

Feel free to request more features, for this plugin. Next roadmap for this plugin will be:

  1. Code generation for API request
  2. Hands On API Request on Plugin
  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)
plugins.tagline: Simplify API and Design documentation by annotating component with swagger API docs.

  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)
113888.tagline: Simplify API and Design documentation by annotating component with swagger API docs.

plugins.name: Token Template
plugins.description: When working with variables on an ongoing project, the structure of your variables evolves with each version. This plugin allows you to create "Releases" to capture the current state of your document's variables and export them in individual structures, distinguishing between active and older versions. Token Template also helps you maintain identical variable exports across multiple Figma documents. The plugin is currently in beta.
plugins.tagline: Release-versioning and export of variables

136017.description: When working with variables on an ongoing project, the structure of your variables evolves with each version. plugins.name: Quick Fill and Hug
plugins.description:
Streamlines layout adjustments by allowing designers to quickly modify the sizing behavior of selected elements.


With simple commands, users can toggle between "Fill Container" and "Hug Contents" for both horizontal and vertical directions. This functionality saves time when working with responsive layouts, ensuring consistent spacing and alignment across designs.
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to fill and hug horizontal/vertically

100803.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to fill and hug horizontal/vertically

plugins.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area
plugins.description:
Intro

In Figma, the current scale is not shown anywhere on the canvas. You can’t see how far you have moved from the actual scale of the frame. You can only select the frame and see its dimensions. And then estimate the ratio of pixels to percentages.


In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

accepted.name: Roman Nebel
accepted.description: IT Manager / UX Expert / Pet-projects Developer

plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area

119907.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area
119907.description:

In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

manifest.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area

119907.release_notes:
2.0 – Feel FREE!

Fixiq now is absolutely free and open-source.
119907.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area

plugins.name: Swift Layer Exporter
plugins.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.
plugins.tagline: Manage export layers by name

124254.name: Swift Layer Exporter
124254.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.

plugins.name: UX Buddy - AI powered pair designer
plugins.description:
UX Buddy is your AI-powered design partner, built to streamline your UX workflow and enhance your design process within Figma.


  1. Uncover Assumptions: Identify and challenge underlying assumptions in your designs.
  2. Discover Edge Cases: Proactively find potential error states and unusual user interactions.
  3. Evaluate Usability: Get AI-driven feedback on the usability of your selected layers based on established heuristics.
  4. Check Accessibility: Perform quick accessibility checks, considering WCAG guidelines for aspects like color contrast and more.
  5. Contextual Analysis: Provide persona details, research insights, and other context to get more tailored feedback from your AI Buddy.
  6. Flexible AI Providers: Connect to various AI services including OpenAI, GroqCloud, Hugging Face, or your local Ollama instance.
  7. Customizable Prompts: Tailor UX Buddy to your specific needs by creating and managing your own prompt library.


Whether you're brainstorming, refining user flows, or conducting detailed evaluations, UX Buddy acts as an intelligent assistant, helping you make more informed design decisions and create better user experiences, faster.


--------

How to set up AI Provider:


☁️ Option 1: Cloud APIs (OpenAI, GroqCloud, Hugging Face)


Use cloud-based AI models by connecting to one of these supported services.

  1. Select “Cloud API”.
  2. Choose your service (OpenAI, GroqCloud, or Hugging Face) from the dropdown.
  3. Enter your credentials:
  4. OpenAI: API Key from platform.openai.com
  5. ⚠️ Important: OpenAI requires a funded account to use the API. Free trial credits may be available, but ongoing usage requires a billing setup.
  6. GroqCloud: API Key from console.groq.com
  7. Hugging Face: Access Token from huggingface.co/settings/tokens
  8. Enter the Model Name : choose a vision-capable model:
  9. OpenAI: e.g., gpt-4o, gpt-4-vision-preview
  10. GroqCloud: e.g., meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruct
  11. Hugging Face: e.g., google/gemma-3-27b-it
  12. Click “Test Current AI Connection” to verify everything works.


-----

💻 Option 2: Ollama (Local AI)


Use Ollama to run models locally on your machine—no internet required once models are downloaded.


🔧 Prerequisites:

  1. Install Ollama: Download it from ollama.com.
  2. Run Ollama:
  3. Launch Ollama via terminal (ollama serve) or the desktop app.
  4. For convenience, you can set it up to run in the background automatically:
  5. macOS: via a plist launch agent
  6. Linux: via a systemd service (Note: These are part of your system configuration and not managed by UX Buddy.)
  7. Download Your Model:
  8. Use ollama pull llava or another vision-enabled model.
  9. Ensure the model supports your desired functionality (e.g., image analysis).


🛠️ Configuration in UX Buddy:

  1. Select “Ollama” as your provider.
  2. Enter your API Base URL — usually http://localhost:11434.
  3. Enter the Model Name (e.g., llava, llama3, etc.).
  4. Click “Test Current AI Connection”.
plugins.tagline: Your AI-powered UX design partner.

plugins.name: Polaroids
plugins.description:
Polaroids – Bring a Touch of Nostalgia to Your Designs

Transform any frame into a beautifully styled Polaroid image—in seconds.


Polaroid Maker is your go-to tool for adding a warm, analog vibe to digital designs. Whether you’re building a moodboard, designing a presentation, or crafting a portfolio, this plugin helps you wrap your visuals in the charm of vintage photography.


Features:

Adjustable Padding – Control the spacing for that perfect Polaroid balance.


Customizable Corner Radius – Keep it sharp or go rounded for a softer feel.


Handwritten-style Captions – Add personality with a built-in handwriting font.


Stacking Options – Single, double, or multiple cards for layered vibes.


Shadow Effects – Add subtle or dramatic depth with three shadow styles.


Polaroid Maker was built to make visual storytelling more tactile, expressive, and fun—without needing any design hacks or frame juggling.
plugins.tagline: Turn any frame into a clean, customizable Polaroid.

136380.description:

Features:

Customizable Corner Radius – Keep it sharp or go rounded for a softer feel.

Polaroid Maker was built to make visual storytelling more tactile, expressive, and fun—without needing any design hacks or frame juggling.
136380.tagline: Turn any frame into a clean, customizable Polaroid.

plugins.name: Consistency Checker
plugins.description:
Consistency Checker is your all-in-one solution for ensuring your designs meet WCAG AA standards for text contrast. With a single click, check the accessibility of all text layers in a selected frame, helping you create more inclusive designs effortlessly.


Designing for accessibility shouldn't be an afterthought. Consistency Checker analyzes all text layers within a selected frame, instantly providing contrast ratio information and WCAG AA compliance status.


What This Plugin Does

  1. Evaluates text contrast ratios against backgrounds for all text layers simultaneously
  2. Shows WCAG AA pass/fail status for each text element
  3. Provides detailed contrast ratio measurements
  4. Allows quick navigation to problematic text layers with a single click
  5. Helps you identify accessibility issues early in your design process
  6. Generates comprehensive reports for documentation and team sharing


How It Works

  1. Select any frame containing text layers you want to evaluate
  2. Run Consistency Checker to instantly scan all text elements
  3. View a complete list of text layers with their contrast ratios and WCAG AA compliance status
  4. Click on any text layer in the results to jump directly to it in your design
  5. Make necessary adjustments to improve accessibility
  6. Re-scan to confirm your changes meet accessibility standards


Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users. Install Consistency Checker today!
plugins.tagline: Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users

129453.description:

Designing for accessibility shouldn't be an afterthought. Consistency Checker analyzes all text layers within a selected frame, instantly providing contrast ratio information and WCAG AA compliance status.


What This Plugin Does

  1. Evaluates text contrast ratios against backgrounds for all text layers simultaneously
  2. Shows WCAG AA pass/fail status for each text element
  3. Provides detailed contrast ratio measurements
  4. Allows quick navigation to problematic text layers with a single click
  5. Helps you identify accessibility issues early in your design process
  6. Generates comprehensive reports for documentation and team sharing


How It Works

  2. Run Consistency Checker to instantly scan all text elements
  3. View a complete list of text layers with their contrast ratios and WCAG AA compliance status
  4. Click on any text layer in the results to jump directly to it in your design
  5. Make necessary adjustments to improve accessibility
  6. Re-scan to confirm your changes meet accessibility standards


Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users. Install Consistency Checker today!
129453.release_notes: • Canvas now automatically pans and zooms to focus on the selected text layer when clicking the "Go to text layer"
129453.tagline: Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users

plugins.name: Fillio - Elevate design with dynamic content
plugins.description:
Fillio - Less Typing, More Designing


Fillio is the simplest way to populate your Figma designs with realistic {{placeholder}} content. Whether you’re working on wireframes, prototypes, invoices, brand books, or daily UI design, Fillio saves you time by instantly filling your artboards with dynamic content.



Key Features:


Quick & Easy Filling:

Fill your designs with placeholders like names, addresses, and all type of contents in a single click.


Customizable Placeholders:

Use simple tags like {{name}} or {{Date}} to create dynamic content that fits your design.


Efficient Workflow:

Skip the tedious task of manually adding content—let Fillio do the heavy lifting.


Perfect for Prototypes & Wireframes:

Make your designs look polished even in early stages, without all the manual effort.



How it Works:


  1. Install Fillio from the Figma Community.
  2. Select the elements or frames where you want to add placeholders.
  3. Define Your Placeholders using simple tags like {{name}} or {{Type}}.
  4. Click “Submit”, and Fillio automatically adds content to your design.



Get Started with Fillio Today!

accepted.name: Mohammed M.Akasha
accepted.description: A User-centered Designer who crafts meaningful products through design.

plugins.tagline: Less Filling.. More designing.

plugins.name: Lexi: Localize & Translate your design
plugins.description:
Design once—translate instantly. Lexi automates text translation in your Figma frames while keeping your layout intact. Perfect for multilingual apps, marketing assets, and App/Play Store screenshots.


🚀 Why Lexi?

50+ languages – Translate your designs into multiple languages in seconds.

Batch translation – Select multiple frames & languages at once.

Seamless workflow – Translated frames stay organized with clear naming.



🔧 How It Works

Select your frames – Pick the designs you need to translate.

Choose your languages – Supports all major languages, including English, Spanish, Japanese, Arabic, and more.

Translate with AI – Lexi uses OpenAI’s GPT-3.5 Turbo for high-quality, natural translations.

Get organized output – New frames are created, named with language codes, and maintain the original design structure.


🔒 Best Practices

Font compatibility – If a language isn't displaying correctly, try swapping fonts to Roboto or Inter for best results.


Who is Lexi for?

🌎 Designers working on global products.

📱 Teams creating multi-language UI/UX designs.

📢 Marketers adapting assets for international campaigns.

🏢 Agencies handling multilingual clients.


Credits:

Some of the designs featured in this plugin are from @ramsriperambudr. Thanks for the amazing work! 🙌


Ready to make your designs multilingual? Start localizing with Lexi today! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Translate all text in selected frames—perfect for multilingual apps & App/Play Store assets.

plugins.name: dpicon - SVG Icons
plugins.description:
dpicon is a Figma plugin that provides 944 high-quality filled SVG icons for your design projects. Whether you're creating wireframes, prototypes, or polished UI designs, dpicon makes it easy to find and insert the perfect icon. Search for icons by name, double-click to place them on the canvas, or drag and drop for precise placement. With a sleek grid view and real-time search, dpicon streamlines your workflow and boosts productivity.


Key Features:

- 944 filled SVG icons, ready to use.

- Real-time search to quickly find icons.

- Double-click to place icons on the canvas.

- Lightweight and optimized for performance.


Perfect for designers looking to add professional icons to their Figma projects with ease.
plugins.tagline: Icons at Your Fingertips

plugins.name: BANCONE
plugins.description: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools that simplify, optimize, and improve the quality of Human-Machine Interaction (HMI) design and development. Initially focused on the automotive sector, specifically software-defined vehicles, the platform is designed to expand to other industrial domains in the future. BANCONE transforms how automotive teams create and implement sophisticated cockpit interfaces, leveraging artificial intelligence to automate routine tasks, detect issues early, and generate innovative design solutions.
plugins.tagline: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools

plugins.name: Text Filler with CSV
plugins.description:
You can populate components containing multiple text elements with strings from a CSV file.

Tab-separated values are also supported, allowing copy-paste directly from Google Spreadsheet.

Rows and columns are applied in layer order, and empty cells are skipped.


複数のテキストを含むコンポーネントに CSV から文字列を流し込むことができます。

タブ区切りにも対応し、Google Spreadsheet からのコピペも対応しています。

行や列は、レイヤー順に適用され、空のセルはスキップされます。


解説記事： https://note.com/feb19/n/n17ac26f980e0
plugins.tagline: Populate components with multiple text fields from CSV automatically. 複数テキストを持つコンポーネントに文字列を自動入力できます。

plugins.name: Component Boss (Beta)
plugins.description:
Figma Component Boss is a powerful plugin that helps designers efficiently manage components with just a few clicks. Whether you need to convert multiple objects into a master component with linked instances or replace selected objects with an existing component, this plugin streamlines the process—saving time and maintaining consistency in your designs.


How It Works


🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!
plugins.tagline: Supercharge Your Design Workflow

🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!

plugins.name: Move Objects Frame
plugins.description:
Move Objects to Frame - オブジェクトをフレームに移動 -


このプラグインを使えば、選択したオブジェクトを指定したフレーム内に素早く移動 できます。

また、フレームに入っていないオブジェクトを検出 して、整理しやすくします。


主な機能：

✅ 選択したオブジェクトを 元の位置を維持したまま フレーム内に移動

✅ フレーム外にあるオブジェクトを検出し、通知でリストアップ

✅ 英語と日本語の両方に対応

✅ シンプルで直感的なUI


📌 使い方：

1️⃣ 1つのフレーム と フレーム内に入れたいオブジェクト を選択します。

2️⃣ 「移動する」ボタンをクリック すると、オブジェクトが位置を変えずにフレーム内へ移動します。

3️⃣ 「フレーム外を確認 🔍」をクリック すると、フレームに入っていないオブジェクトを検出し、リストで表示 します。


Move Objects to Frame を使って、作業効率をアップし、デザインを整理整頓しましょう！🎯

-----------------------------------------------

This plugin allows you to quickly move selected objects into a chosen frame while keeping their original positions.

It also detects objects that are outside any frames and helps you organize your Figma workspace more efficiently.


Features:

✅ Move multiple objects into a selected frame while preserving their positions

✅ Check if objects are outside any frames and get notified

✅ Supports both English and Japanese

✅ Simple and intuitive UI


📌 How to use:

1️⃣ Select one frame and one or more objects that you want to place inside.

2️⃣ Click the “Move it!” button, and the objects will be placed inside the frame without changing their positions.

3️⃣ To check for objects that are not inside any frames, click “Check Unframed 🔍” and get a list of unframed objects.


Boost your workflow efficiency and keep your designs well-organized with Move Objects to Frame! 🎯
plugins.tagline: Move objects into a frame while keeping their positions. Detect and list objects outside any frames.

plugins.name: Page Builder PRO
plugins.description:
PageBuilder PRO is your ultimate tool for streamlining project organization in Figma. With just a few clicks, you can automatically create a set of well-structured pages tailored to your design workflow.


Key Features:

•Customizable Pages: Predefined templates for common design tasks, including wireframes, design QA, prototypes, and more.

•Interactive UI: Select only the pages you need for each project.

•Effortless Setup: Save time and stay organized with auto-generated frames, titles, and descriptions.

•Built-In Guidelines: Each page comes with optional content to guide your design process.


Whether you’re working on a small prototype or a large-scale project, PageBuilder PRO helps you start on the right foot.

accepted.name: ASSIST Software
accepted.description:
Design work that converts. 
From idea to market 🚀
Design team @ ASSIST Software

plugins.tagline: Your Blueprint for Project Organization.

plugins.name: BableBox
plugins.description:
BableBox is a Figma plugin designed to make translating your interfaces a breeze. With a single click, it converts your entire design from one language to another, preserving context to ensure accurate, natural translations.


Say goodbye to the hassle of translating hundreds of words and phrases manually! BableBox leverages GPT-4o mini, one of the best AI models, which understands the context of each text to avoid errors (it intelligently skips icons and symbols like FontAwesome, for instance).


This plugin is perfect for designers and global teams looking for a fast, reliable, and easy solution to translate projects while maintaining content coherence and quality.


In short: a one-click translation tool built to save you time and reduce errors. 🌍🚀
plugins.tagline: BableBox: Translate your designs in one click, with perfect context 🌍

This plugin is perfect for designers and global teams looking for a fast, reliable, and easy solution to translate projects while maintaining content coherence and quality.


In short: a one-click translation tool built to save you time and reduce errors. 🌍🚀

plugins.name: Juxync
plugins.description:
Want to get alpha access to Jux? Visit jux.io


Jux is a code-based canvas design tool that plugs right into developer's codebase, enabling product designers to design the UI itself and developers its logic.

Creating a good color tokens system is a complex task. Use Juxync to import your variables to Jux to use as design tokens. Juxync will convert your variables collections, groups and modes into token sets to use in Jux. It will maintain all the relationships between variables.


How does Juxync work?

For more visual ‘how does it work‘, visit the knowledge base

  1. It scans Figma color variables in your chosen file.
  2. The plugin auto maps the tokens into core, and other semantics sets.
  3. Sync the tokens into the Jux token management, allowing developers to view and use these tokens via our CLI.


Next up: (or Future features)

  1. Sync Assets (SVG)
  2. Dimensions tokens
  3. Typography styles
  4. Check out the roadmap for more information


Want to be among the first to join the alpha? Join our community

accepted.name: Jux
accepted.description: We’re building a code-based design tool so designers can design the actual, real product as it will be used in production.

plugins.tagline: Juxync imports your Figma Variables as design tokens to Jux, seamlessly.

plugins.name: Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder
plugins.description:
Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder For Dev Mode


Varcator is a Figma plugin that helps you find where text variables are being used in your design files. It provides an efficient way to scan and track variable usage across your Figma projects.


🔥 Highly Recommend to select one variable at a time. 🔥


Features


  1. Variable Collection Scanning: Scan all text variables in your Figma file
  2. Selective Scanning: Choose which variables to scan for usage
  3. Usage Tracking: Find where each variable is being used
  4. Interactive UI: Click on usages to navigate to the specific layers
  5. Efficient Processing: Optimized scanning with rate limiting to prevent API throttling
  6. User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for easy variable management
plugins.tagline: Figma Variable Usage Finder for Dev Mode

133934.name: Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder
133934.description:
Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder For Dev Mode


Varcator is a Figma plugin that helps you find where text variables are being used in your design files. It provides an efficient way to scan and track variable usage across your Figma projects.


🔥 Highly Recommend to select one variable at a time. 🔥


Features


  1. Variable Collection Scanning: Scan all text variables in your Figma file
  2. Selective Scanning: Choose which variables to scan for usage
  3. Usage Tracking: Find where each variable is being used
  4. Interactive UI: Click on usages to navigate to the specific layers
  5. Efficient Processing: Optimized scanning with rate limiting to prevent API throttling
  6. User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for easy variable management
133934.tagline: Figma Variable Usage Finder for Dev Mode

plugins.name: PRE: AI Design Review
plugins.description:
PRE helps designers and product teams understand how users will interact with their UI designs — before a single line of code is written.


🔹 Select any frame in Figma and click “Upload Selected Frame” to send it to PRE.

🔹 PRE will automatically generate a heatmap, predict click-through rates, and provide UX suggestions using AI.

🔹 You can modify the generated tags, draw additional clickable elements, or toggle the heatmap overlay on and off using the second button in the top bar.

🔹 Once you're happy with the predictions, you can download the heatmap and click data for further analysis or presentation.


Whether you're working on early wireframes or high-fidelity mocks, PRE helps you make design decisions backed by predictive user analytics — all from right inside Figma.


Powered by PRE
plugins.tagline: Export any Figma frame and instantly generate heatmaps, CTR predictions and UX feedback with PRE.

133946.name: PRE: AI Design Review
133946.description:
PRE helps designers and product teams understand how users will interact with their UI designs — before a single line of code is written.


🔹 Select any frame in Figma and click “Upload Selected Frame” to send it to PRE.

🔹 PRE will automatically generate a heatmap, predict click-through rates, and provide UX suggestions using AI.

🔹 You can modify the generated tags, draw additional clickable elements, or toggle the heatmap overlay on and off using the second button in the top bar.

🔹 Once you're happy with the predictions, you can download the heatmap and click data for further analysis or presentation.


Whether you're working on early wireframes or high-fidelity mocks, PRE helps you make design decisions backed by predictive user analytics — all from right inside Figma.


Powered by PRE
133946.release_notes:
New modern UI with streamlined upload flow.
Integration with PRE 2.5.
Enhanced Design Review feedback section.
Improved support messaging for invalid selections.
133946.tagline: Export any Figma frame and instantly generate heatmaps, CTR predictions and UX feedback with PRE.

plugins.name: Text Styles to Variables
plugins.description:
PLUGIN CRAFTED FOR REFOKUS


Plugin Documentation

This plugin extracts font-related properties from your local text styles and converts them into reusable variables. It automatically applies the following variables:

•Font size

•Font weight

•Font family


Additionally, the plugin documents—but does not apply—the following properties:

•Line height

•Letter spacing


This is due to a current Figma limitation: dynamic variables for these properties are not yet supported. As a workaround, these values are stored as string variables for documentation purposes only.


For example:

If the original line-height is 100%, the plugin will store it as a variable with:

variableName: 100%, variableValue: 1em (calculated as 100 ÷ 100 × 1em)


Naming Convention for text styles:


To ensure accurate detection and conversion, your text styles should follow this naming structure:

•Use the prefix title- followed by a number (e.g., title-1) for headings

•Use the prefix text- followed by a number (e.g., text-2) for paragraphs


You can also use suffixes to describe combo classes. For instance:

•text-2-buttonLabel


This will still be recognized as a text-2 style with additional contextual information.
plugins.tagline: By Fede Luna

plugins.name: Ting-Image
plugins.description:
Ting Image—One-click compression, instant format conversion. Switch between PNG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF for smaller, optimized images. Efficiency meets ease!

1. Efficient Compression

Advanced algorithms reduce image size while preserving quality, saving storage and speeding up load times.

2. Multi-Format Conversion

Instantly switch between PNG, JPEG, WEBP, and AVIF formats to fit any design or development need.

3. Batch Processing

Process multiple images at once to save time and boost productivity.

4. Smart Preview

Real-time previews let you compare and control compression quality effortlessly.

5. Seamless Integration

Works directly within Figma, keeping your design workflow smooth and uninterrupted.

6. Lightweight & Stable

Runs efficiently without slowing down Figma, ensuring a seamless experience.


Thank you for your support

@Wiley Shaw @v-huanghaolan
plugins.tagline: Export PNG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF,

plugins.name: Link Spacing & Radius Variables (Alpha)
plugins.description:
One-click application of variables to selected objects


Important: Variable Requirements

1. Variables must be in an external library (local variables are not supported yet)

2. The library must be connected to your file


Variable Naming Requirements:

For Spacing:

- Format: `space-{number}`

- Examples: `space-4`, `space-8`, `space-16`, `space-24`

- Variable value must match the number in the name

For Radius:

- Format: `radius-{number}`

- Examples: `radius-4`, `radius-8`, `radius-16`

- Variable value must match the number in the name


Collection Requirements:

- Spacing collection must include the word "spacing" in its name

- Radius collection must include the word "radius" or "border-radius" in its name


How to Prepare Your File

1. Connect the variable library:

- Open "Team Library" menu

- Find the required library

- Enable the toggle next to the "Variables" section

2. Ensure objects are prepared:

- For spacing: objects must use Auto Layout

- For radius: objects must support the cornerRadius property


How to Use

1. Select objects you want to apply variables to

2. Launch the plugin

3. Choose the desired collection from the dropdown (marked with 📚 icon)

4. Click "Apply spacing" or "Apply radius"
plugins.tagline: Link spacing and radius variables

plugins.name: Structura – Effortless Page Organization
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.


Structura helps teams and designers maintain consistency across projects by enabling the creation, saving, and application of structured page layouts. Whether you prefer using built-in presets or custom templates, Structura simplifies your workflow, ensuring every file is clear and organized.



✨ Key Features


  1. Create & Save Custom Templates – Design your own page structures and reuse them effortlessly.
  2. Use Ready-Made Presets – Get started instantly with professionally designed page layouts.
  3. One-Click Template Application – Quickly apply a structure to any Figma file.
  4. Consistent File Organization – Standardize file layouts for better team collaboration.
  5. Easy Editing & Updating – Modify and update templates as your workflow evolves.



🚀 How to Use


  1. Choose a Template – Select from built-in presets or create your own.
  2. Apply to Your File – Instantly structure your Figma pages with one click.
  3. Customize as Needed – Edit sections or save new layouts for future use.
  4. Stay Organized – Ensure every file follows a consistent and streamlined structure.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.

plugins.name: Tailwind / Flutter Basic Setup
plugins.description:
This Plugin will generate code, styles and config options for the following things:

Tailwind:

  1. text styles (as css)
  2. font families (for tailwind.config.js)
  3. colors (for tailwind.config.js)

Flutter:

  1. Color constants
  2. TextStyles for fonts
plugins.tagline: Create simple Tailwind or Flutter styles and classes from Colors and Text Styles.
